summary: All dialogue/scene references about dragons/dragonborn are removed, with functional Civil War quest lines. ONLY dialogue is altered, all physical references of dragons/dragonborn presence are intact(word walls, Helgen, burned shack near Helgen, dragon lair map markers, loading screen\'s)
descriptionHtml:
All dialogue/scene references about dragons/dragonborn are removed, with functional Civil War quest lines. ONLY dialogue is altered, all physical references of dragons/dragonborn presence are intact(word walls, Helgen, burned shack near Helgen, dragon lair map markers, loading screen\'s)
 
 Compatibility: 100% Compatible with every mod that does not tamper with dialogue.

 Issue: You won\'t be able to buy a house in Whiterun, unless you use a console.

 IMPORTANT NOTE: Do not install this mod if you play Main Quest or want to start a new game with Main Quest. If you are manually installing/uninstalling, don\'t forget to remove scripts.

  Enjoy ;)
author: megatenP
